### FAQ

*   ##### Do you offer a free trial?
    
    Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial. Submit a trial request [here](https://www.officernd.com/signup/) to get started immediately.
    
*   ##### What is an active member?
    
    An active member is defined as:
    
    *   a person who is assigned an active monthly product (recurring membership) or service in OfficeRnD.
    *   a person who is part of a company with an active monthly (recurring membership) product or service in OfficeRnD.
    *   a person who is assigned a non-recurring charge (one-off fee) OR booked a room through OfficeRnD for the respective month.
    
*   ##### Do you have a native mobile app?
    
    Yes, we have [native mobile app](https://www.officernd.com/coworking-software/member-mobile-apps/) that allows your members to self-service themselves and engage with the community. It's available both on the [Apple App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/rnd-connect/id1262353929) and [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.officernd.rnd_connect).
    
*   ##### What integrations do you support?
    
    You can see a full list of the integrations we currently support [here](https://www.officernd.com/integrations/). We also have an [open API](https://developer.officernd.com/) that you can use to develop an integration yourself. You can check it out [here](https://developer.officernd.com/).
    
*   ##### Do you charge in currencies other than US dollars?
    
    Yes, we can also charge in EUR, GBP and AUD depending on your location.
    
*   ##### Do you offer help with system setup and training?
    
    Yes, we do! We guide you through a step-by-step setup process and help you with importing your members' information, bookings and floor plans into the system. [EXPLORE OUR TRAININGS](https://www.officernd.com/#addOnModal)
    
*   ##### How to contact Support or report issues?
    
    You can either email us at [support@officernd.com](mailto:support@officernd.com) or send us a ticket [here](https://help.officernd.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
    
*   ##### Have more questions?
    
    Please check our detailed Pricing FAQ section by clicking [here](https://help.officernd.com/hc/en-us/articles/360019548619-OfficeRnD-Subscription-and-Pricing-).
    
*   ##### What is a location?
    
    A location is defined as a physical location of the office operator with its own street address. In with multiple buildings located on the same street address each building will count as a separate location. The OfficeRnD subscription plan counts locations in **“Open”** and **“Draft”** status towards your subscription plan quota.
